Description: Body fragment of Milesian Fikellura style pottery amphora; beige slip, decorated with scale pattern; below band of strokes and frieze of crescents; painted in reddish-brown paint
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 133-4, no. Nau 99, pl. 22, fig. b)
CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p. 11 no. 20, pl. 2, no. 20.)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.051)
